website_summaries.verdict: Thermometer puts a protective cover on your faucet and measures the temperature of the water coming into the bath at the same time.
pros: Product shows a "comfort zone" to help you gauge water temperature
Can show either Celsius or Fahrenheit
cons: Measures water as it is coming out of the faucet, but will not continually take the temperature during the bath

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good water thermometer with a universal mounting
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good water thermometer with a universal mounting. Super easy to install, i think it took less then a minute for me. The idea is very simple: water should flow through the temperature sensor....and that is it. Also it requires 3 AAA battery.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these and both of them got water in them and stopped working after couple months. They are nice when they are working but not worth the cost when only last couple months. So much for being water proof. Really need to work on sealing it a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful for peace of mind and for baby’s safety
customer_reviews.text: I totally understand that this is one of those things they made just for first time moms that will buy anything to alleviate potential harm to the new baby. But I think this one is actually worth while, if you’re a normal human that has your hot water heater set high enough to get a warm shower. It’s super helpful to know where the green (safe for baby) temp is on bathwater so it’s one less thing you have to worry about when bathing a screaming infant.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Had to request warranty replacement within first months
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months we had to submit a warranty request because water got into the screen so we could no longer read the temp. 4 Moms did honor the warranty and sent a replacement without any trouble but being without the product for a week plus was frustrating. We like that this is a 2 in 1 solution (preventing bumps and monitoring temp) but I honestly would not buy the product again so I am giving it a 3 Star rating.
customer_reviews.author: SnowmobileVT

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be great to have a cover that tells the temp
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be great to have a cover that tells the temp. My wife instantly hated it and I hated it shortly after. It doesn't stay on the spout well at all. Then, with kids being as curious as they are, my son keeps pushing the button to turn it on and off and then pulls it off since it just barely hangs on to begin with. It was used for about 3 baths before it just sat on the shelf. Just stick to low tech on this one to keep their heads from bumping the spout!
customer_reviews.author: D Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very glad I bought this, and VERY glad that I upgraded from the rubber ducky one!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is so handy in so many ways! It has kept my son from busting his head several times, it tells me when the temp is safe for my son without having to play with the knobs, and when I get baths I don't have to sit there turning the heat up and down. I find my perfect temp and put the plug in when the digital readout says it's perfect. Very glad I bought this, and VERY glad that I upgraded from the rubber ducky one!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly on variety of tub faucets in our house
customer_reviews.text: We love this temp gauge! Easy to set up and I feel confident knowing that my baby's bath is the perfect temperature. We've been using now for about 1 month with no issues. We used on our roman style master bathroom tub and recently transitioned baby to bathroom nearest his bedroom with standard tub faucet. It worked perfectly on both style of faucets. Some reviews have mentioned that the temperature does not read above 100 degrees but this must have been an issue with older models. Ours beeps and turns red above 100 degrees but still displays the temperature. I would highly recommend this product to parents of babies and toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Katie.Plus.Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Takes the guess work out of baby's bath temperature
customer_reviews.text: My only negative complaint about this spout cover is actually a complaint about my bathtub's faucet. This spout cover instantly tells you the temperature of your baby's bath water. It's super easy to install and use. Simply turn on the unit and adjust the bath water. It shows the safe temperature range and turns red when the water is too hot as well as beeping in alarm. As I previously alluded to, our bathtub faucet makes it difficult to get ge perfect bath temperature, but that's not the fault of 4moms.
customer_reviews.author: Marksman1122

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but it isn't adjustable and didn't fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but it isn't adjustable and didn't fit on our faucet. Unfortunately I bought it when our baby was born and didn't realize it didn't fit until months later when she actually started using the big tub (instead of the sink)...and now it's too late to return it. I'd recommend trying this as soon as you buy it, even if you aren't planning on using it for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Christina F

customer_reviews.title: Definitely get this for yourself or someone else
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best gifts we received from the baby shower. It takes all the guess work out of the temperature I highly recommend this product because every person has a different level of how hot water is and your hotness level might be to much for the baby this stops this. Get this for yourself or a gift
customer_reviews.author: Bobby E.

customer_reviews.title: On the list of products we recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.text: We started with one of those cheap rubber ducky that says if the water is too hot. It was crap. Then we bought this and give our baby a perfect temperature bath everyday. She loves bath time when the water is a perfect 98 degrees. Any I don't realize how much the temperature changes with just a nudge to the spout on our tub.
customer_reviews.author: KmmTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time parents
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My husband and I are first time parents. This is a no brainer and makes it easy to tell when water is too hot or cold. Before getting this my husband was nervous to do baths without me to test the water. Now he’s comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alsmith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Necessity!
customer_reviews.text: No more guessing at the temperature for baby. I like hot showers, so it's hard for me to select the temp for baby, but this keeps me in line. I started out with the little duck that says HOT on the bottom, but it's not accurate and no good for pouring in new water or rinsing. The duck is useless for temperature, but a keeper for bath time of course.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: great for getting the temperature right for your children's bath
customer_reviews.text: We had the 4moms bathtub which had the same temperature feature. It made me realize that I like my water way too hot. Now that my son is taking baths in the real bathtub I like having this on the faucet to help me gauge the correct temperature. It was easy to put onto the faucet and works great. I kind of wish they made it cuter...like maybe a whale or another design like i've seen. I think that would make it more fun for my son. No complaints other than that :)
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for knowing what the temperature of bath water is!! When it's too hot, screen turns bright red & beeps none stop. Turns screen blue when cold. Pic shown, green for right temp. No issues with it falling off or my son pulling it off. It has a very long and strong velcro that keeps it secure.
customer_reviews.author: Judy M

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one week ago. It doesn't fit that snug and is very loose. Used it twice and the second time my son pulled it of into the water and basically $30.00 down the drain. I have used other 4moms products with no problems. So unless you have an infant that sits perfectly still while bathing DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept and being able to know if the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept and being able to know if the water is a good temperature with out having to feel it every few seconds,we have a very finicky water heater, your shower diverter has to be towards the end of the faucet though and the ones at our apartment are close to the wall ):
customer_reviews.author: S. Rakowitz

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again or as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after purchasing several failed in-bath thermometers. Although this one is quite a bit more expensive you get what you pay for. This not only acts as a thermometer but also a spout cover which is great. Temperature is spot on and beeps and turns red if the water is too warm, is green when the water is just right, and is blue if the water is too cold. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M Baab

customer_reviews.title: Great item to regulate bath temperature!
customer_reviews.text: This fits over the bath faucet and tells you the temperature of the water as it comes out. You must adjust the water for the temperature you desire. Simple to use. No guessing uf water is too hot or too cold for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Janet D

customer_reviews.title: This is great! The only issue I have is that it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! The only issue I have is that it slips off the spout when I am using it. My home is older and the spout does not have the 'pull tab' for the shower. Instead we have a handle that turns. Because the 'pull tab' isn't there, the cover slips off the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: I looked around and this fit the bill as i seen alot of bad reviews on the floating ones
customer_reviews.text: Wife asked me to get her a tub thermometer for our little one. I looked around and this fit the bill as i seen alot of bad reviews on the floating ones. Installed on tub and tested. She lokes that it also shows colors to help identify when the water is in an acceptable range. Recommend if your looking to keep the little ones water just right.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a few more degrees in the green zone!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make sure I am not going to burn my baby, as I am very insensitive to heat. However, I think that 99.9 is too cold, so I go up to 102. Her skin doesn't turn red or anything. It is annoying that I can't turn off the beeping at that temperature without shutting it off because the beeping makes my dog bark. As a side note, it is soft and whenever I stand her up to wash her back and booty, she likes to grab it.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkle Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and it works perfectly on our standard bath ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation and it works perfectly on our standard bath faucet. Obviously the water temp changes when it hits the tub so I always fill the tub at 99 degrees on the thermometer knowing it is probably 95-96 in the tub (all these temps are in the "safe range"). We have been using for a couple months now and we love it! It was any easy decision to purchase after our baby outgrew his 4moms bath tub which was great and had a very similar thermometer feature. I feel a lot better using this instead of those toxic floating plastic thermometers.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after falling in love with our 4Moms tub that had the same technology. Our daughter outgrew the tub but I still wanted to be able to ensure the appropriate temperature water was making it into the tub. This spout cover works just as well as the thermometer on the 4Moms tub. If it gets too hot the display turns red and beeps. If the water is just right, the display is green and if its too cold the display turns blue. The spout cover was also VERY easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Cameren Kotwicki

customer_reviews.title: I love so much, now I purchase for baby showers gifts!
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this for years. I love the instant feedback and am confident know my child is in an appropriate bat temperature. It eases my mind to know my daughter won’t get scalded. I now buy to give as a baby gift! Of all the items I’ve purchased for my child this is the ONE thing I’m STILL using!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Huckins

customer_reviews.title: 4Moms is the best
customer_reviews.text: I am usually pretty thrifty, but when it comes to baby items I splurge for 4Moms when there is an option. They truly do have the best products and this is no different. Precise and immediate temperature results along with color coordination, and there is even an alarm that goes off if the temperature gets too hot (screen also turns red). We have the regular 4Moms tub, then as our daughter grew we use an in-bath tub and measure temperature with this item. We also have the 4Moms pack n play and it is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: The Chad

customer_reviews.title: Easy and clear.
customer_reviews.text: Best bath thermometer I've found. Uses color, sound, and flashing to indicate dangerous temps. Easy to install. Easy to use. Easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: April B.

customer_reviews.title: Works good when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Works good when it worked. First one lasted 6 months and the replacement lasted 2 weeks. For something the is suppose to measure water temperature the mechanism or waterproofing that is used is insufficient. They make great other products.
customer_reviews.author: bearcat

customer_reviews.title: No worries at bath time
customer_reviews.text: No worries about bathing child. Color coded number so much more accurate than my hand in telling water temp. No fears now about filling tub and putting child in-one less worry. And easy to see aswater continues to fill, alerting to change in temp.
customer_reviews.author: Nice Oldguy

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom I loved having this around for bath time. Took the worry away of the water bring too hot. As an added bonus it was a cover for the spout once baby got old enough to sit up in the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, that sadly eats batteries and can't use NiMH
customer_reviews.text: This is great at measuring the temperature going into the tub, unfortunately it doesn't like NiMH batteries, and eats alkalines, still the piece of mind is very nice.,
customer_reviews.author: B. C.

customer_reviews.title: Water Logged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this while my son was still in his infant tub so when we went into the big tub I was ready. We started using this about 4 months ago and it has stopped working. It clearly has water in the screen and per their website unless it was purchased within 6 months there is nothing they can do. For the price I am very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kruves

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this bath thermometer until it stopped working after 9 months. For the price it should last a lot longer. The screen just went blanks and now it won’t even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It's one of those things that probably isn't necessary, but it sure makes bath time a little more simple! As soon as I get in the right temperature zone, I plug the tub and go about getting baby ready to get in. So easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nmg

customer_reviews.title: Regret purchase
customer_reviews.text: This thing is terrible. I really thought it would be helpful during bath time but all it did was take up room on the faucet. It quit working after a week. Totally not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Lenhoff

customer_reviews.title: Is NOT waterproof - stops working after about 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: This would be a wonderful product if only it was built to last. It is made to be in a wet environment but unfortunately water still gets in and makes it 'short out' and stop working. It worked for about 6 months, which is pretty common from all the other reviews I've read about it. The company apparently knows this because their warranty is of course only 6 months - how convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha A.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I keep my water temperature higher, so this product it great! Easy to place on my faucet, temperature read out is great!
customer_reviews.author: Bryna Moore

customer_reviews.title: handy spout cover for moms !
customer_reviews.text: Moms with eager bathers should get one of these. I got this as a gift for my nephew who was transitioning from an infant tub to the big boys tub . this helps his mom regulate the temperature in the bath tub, and helps teach him bathing rules. The design is great and i lok forward to getting one myself when my baby grows up.
customer_reviews.author: Anetora

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Makes it sooooooo much easier to give the little one a bath. He likes warm water at all times or he's not happy so you're not happy. We have the bath tub made by then with the thermometer in it but it's really only for neborns he wanted to start sitting up in the tub and it just wouldn't work for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my household years ago. Still works perfectly. Forgot to leave a review, but I will buy again for a future family. Honestly, I use it to for that perfect bath temperature. It also acts as a shield for the kids who play in the tub so they dont qake their heads one the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Annon.

customer_reviews.title: Quick, Easy and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Instant fix but be careful not to drench the actual device. I bought 1st one for my 1st born but after 3years and my daughter mistreating it it broke. I bought a 2nd one with confidence for my 2nd born.
customer_reviews.author: Hola

customer_reviews.title: Great! We have the bathtub as well and now ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! We have the bathtub as well and now that our little guy has our grown if this is so nice to controll that water temperature. Too often we have done the water too hot and I feel so bad when you put them in the water and they start to cry in pain, this has saved many tears!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Jolley

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design, did not work properly.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible design. I have a regular Moen faucet on my bath/shower and this thing wouldn't stay in place properly. Slid all around and the sensor has to be PERFECTLY positioned for it to pick up. I returned this thing after one use. I would not recommend. Sad, because I love all of the other 4moms products!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for bathing infants. We just transitioned from our infant tub from kitchen sink to inflatable tub in the regular bathroom. Easy to use and lets me know the water temperature at all times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it! Definitely one of those products that isn't ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! Definitely one of those products that isn't s necessity, but so convenient. I just turn it on and it reads the temp very quickly. It's nice to have the guesswork taken out.
customer_reviews.author: amazon_junkie

customer_reviews.title: really convenient
customer_reviews.text: this is so convenient! saves me time and gives me piece of mind... my only issue is it falls off the spout quite a bit. other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We don’t have bath-time without it. My daughter has a very specific temperature she prefers for her baths lol
customer_reviews.author: Breanne

customer_reviews.title: So safe. So needed!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Lets the family know the temperature, and I cannot tell you how many times our baby has bumped her head on the spout cover, and also how many times our baby has played with the spout cover.
customer_reviews.author: Matt, Houston

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!. Only complaint -it's trapped on ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! . Only complaint -it's trapped on Celsius and I don't know how to switch to Farenheit.
customer_reviews.author: Tressa Jares

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have
customer_reviews.text: This takes the guessing out of wondering if the water is too hot or cold. Just makes bath time a little easier. Also nice for adding water to fish tanks, then you know it’s the right temp.
customer_reviews.author: almwolf

customer_reviews.title: this is the best! best money i spent for bath tools for ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the best! best money i spent for bath tools for my newborn. I think if I would have just done the old way with dipping your elbow in the bath to test the water I would of had wayyyy to warm water for my girl. i like how the colors show green when the water is safe. also when it is too hot it lets out a loud beep until the temperature comes back down.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni H

customer_reviews.title: ... ended up using a cooking thermometer which worked way better.
customer_reviews.text: Broke after using it twice - I ended up using a cooking thermometer which worked way better.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher V Connor

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work but great idea
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but didn't work for the couple I bought this for as a present. Got full refund which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas McEneaney

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this with my other children!
customer_reviews.text: Temperature is spot on. As a spout cover do not expect it to fit like one of those rubber duck covers. It does provide the needed protection but basically sits over the spout and straps on with Velcro. The read out and installation is easy. My five year old loves the color indication on the display. Blue is cold, green is good, red it too hot! I own other 4Moms products and this true to their quality standards.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I really like this
customer_reviews.text: I think this works really well. My 4 year old is always worried about the water being too hot, so I bought this. I explained to her that when it's green the water is perfect, and it really is. We love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Such a great item. I love that I don't have to guess what temperature the water is or if it's safe for the baby. Without this item I would definitely have the water too hot for the baby without knowing. Great item for parents.
customer_reviews.author: SNA

customer_reviews.title: We love this product and use it at bath time every ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this product and use it at bath time every time. It has also helped us know the best temperature for when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: this is something completely unnecessary. It is not a vital baby item AT ...
customer_reviews.text: SO, this is something completely unnecessary. It is not a vital baby item AT ALL. But I love it. I take super hot showers so it is hard for me to figure out what temperature is safe for my child to bathe in. This makes it easy and I can just let the water run without having to hold my hand underneath it the whole time. It also protects from bumps and bruises on the spout, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Rain55

customer_reviews.title: but it has been awesome!! Probably better for first time moms
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to baby shower gift! I thought it was a little "over the top" when I received it as a gift, but it has been awesome!! Probably better for first time moms, takes the guess work out of "is the water too hot for ithem?"
customer_reviews.author: Adam Gruver

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Let's you know if you are in the blue-too cold, green-just right or red-too hot along with the actual temp of water coming out of the faucet. Easily attaches and detaches
customer_reviews.author: Dainya Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra for the temp gauge
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to use. Only problem I have is that it can be a little floppy, but I love the accuracy. The "comfort zones" are super helpful and easy to read, especially with the color changing display. So worth the extra few bucks over basic spout covers to have the temperature gauge built in!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect when bathing a baby. It makes our bath times so much easier! I love it. The baby is happy, the bedtime routine is less hassle and worries, no guessing if it's too hot or cold. The baby now is happy during every bath, warm and comfy, and no tears.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Superior to floating thermometers
customer_reviews.text: This product is much better than a thermometer that floats in the bath. We often fill the tub up to a certain point and then stop the water. When it comes time to rinse we want to turn the water back on and be sure the water coming out of the faucet is 90-100 degrees F. We have the peace of mind that the water is not to hot and not too cold when we are rinsing, and we don't have to worry that the water out of the faucet is a drastically different temperature than the water in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Gossman

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one drop in the tub
customer_reviews.text: This spout cover was great - for a couple of weeks. We have an older home and the fit on the faucet was not perfect, but it was good and it worked really well for us. However, one night I accidentally knocked it and it fell in the tub (totally my fault) and the unit quit working. I get that it was submerged and that was my error, but you'd think a product made for the bath would be a bit more water resistant than one drop in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: lbmeindl

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for our faucet.
customer_reviews.text: It works, but it does not attach to our faucet very well. It needs a better way to adjust the thermocouple length so that you can still tighten it down for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsee T

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, it was great. But 5 months into using it, the temperature reading is not accuracte. It’s shows temperature is hotter than what it is. Tonight it beeped over 105, but it was completely cold to the touch!
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: We had the 4moms baby tub and loved the thermometer feature on it so when my son ...
customer_reviews.text: We had the 4moms baby tub and loved the thermometer feature on it so when my son moved into the big tub I bought this. Love knowing we are i the safe range when filling the tub and doubles as a spout protector so he doesn't hurt his head.
customer_reviews.author: MP_NH

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it was supposed to. My only complaint is that with the straps on it doesn’t stay on very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Cargile

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I don't have to rely on myself as my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 6 months now and what a difference! I was always worried the water was too hot or too cold for my baby and when I got this I was sooooo relieved. I set the water on the warmer side and without this temperature spout I would have thought the water was too hot. I'm glad I don't have to rely on myself as my baby would be taking not so fun cold showers!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi B.

customer_reviews.title: Practical but overlooked so it makes a great shower gift
customer_reviews.text: One of my fav and most used baby products. Practical but overlooked so it makes a great shower gift
customer_reviews.author: LaceyDMax

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great protects the spout and always gives me the right temperature for the water love the display I’ve had it fo awhile and the battery lasts a very long time
customer_reviews.author: jeanettemomof2

customer_reviews.title: We have crazy water & the temperature & pressure change ...
customer_reviews.text: We have crazy water & the temperature & pressure change on a whim. The temperature alarm feature lets us quickly adjust while filling the tub without distracting from baby.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it allows me to give my little one a nice warm bath without worrying that the water is too hot. It's easy to use and install, with just a strap!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Paine

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Thing works really well Kinda makes the water go everywhere though and somehow my wife got it stuck on Celsius but figured out how to turn it back to Fahrenheit
customer_reviews.author: Majer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely amazing! What a great idea. It saves time and energy and gives peace of mind. It Velcros on to the spout and stays put. I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Not entirely necessary but definitely takes the guesswork out of bathing a newborn. Easy to use and attach to any tub!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mowers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this!!!!! I never have to worry if the water is too cold or too hot, just turn it on and voila, instant read!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Heath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I no longer need to put a thermometer in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery B.

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is perfect to get anyone's bath ready. You never have to worry that your bath water being too hot or cold. This is actually the second one I bought. They are durable and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Was so excited about this but couldn’t use it because ...
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited about this but couldn’t use it because it wouldn’t go all the way on the spout because of the water knobs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: My little one is just big enough for the bath tub so we are just getting to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy - lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: Best baby purchase. Love that it tells you when the water is too hot for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Not good for areas that get wet.
customer_reviews.text: It lasted all of a year then got water in it and died. Not water proof. When it works well, it works well... but not good for an area that gets wet... which is what it is for.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMammaKor

customer_reviews.title: Nice little "luxury"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little gem to ensure consistency in my little one's bath water temperature specifically when other people are caring for her (family or babysitter). It fits nicely over the tub spout and is very easy to install and secure. It is kind of bulky and not super attractive but it's definitely tolerable. Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CW23

customer_reviews.title: No more using your elbow
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those luxury products that most old school parents would tell you that you don't need... but it is pretty handy. My only complaint is that the "beep" to warn you that the water is too hot isn't quote loud enough to be heard clearly over the running water. But the flashing red display will still likely get your attention.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t live without
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! Highly suggest. Had it for 2 years so far and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I would waste my time refilling the bath water while my baby ...
customer_reviews.text: For my baby, this is essential to bathtime. Before I purchased this, I always tested the water temperature myself and it was always inconsistent. I would waste my time refilling the bath water while my baby was already undressed and getting cold. Now, I know exactly what temperature is the most comfortable for my baby. I love love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Lu

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I love that I didn't have to guess if the temperature of the water was correct. Plus it has an alarm to tell you the water is too hot which is great for toddlers in case they grab the knob and accidentally turn on the hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisi41

customer_reviews.title: This is great when filling up my babies bath tub
customer_reviews.text: This is great when filling up my babies bath tub. My 9 year old also uses it when turning on her own bath water, we have always had to do it in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Actually made to stay on spout! Works on spout without drain plug!
customer_reviews.author: ProAmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only one year
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it stopped working one year after purchase. No water in the screen. Put fresh batteries. No clue why it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Sheela

customer_reviews.title: ... the far side of the house so this is great for protecting baby in the near-side bath
customer_reviews.text: We have to keep our water heater set very high to push water to the far side of the house so this is great for protecting baby in the near-side bath. You'd be surprised how much fluctuation you see in the temperature as the water continues to run. Also good protection from bonking a head on the faucet. I've only had it a few months so I can't speak to the longevity yet.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit for our tub spout
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely loved the 4moms infant tub so were really excited when we saw this spout cover. Unfortunately because of the way it's shaped it didn't fit over our tub spout (Grohe brand). Either the water wouldn't touch the sensor or the water diverter (is that what it's called?) was totally blocked. Ended up giving it to one of my mommy friends who uses it and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Silly concept but peace of mind is worth everything when it comes to the little ones
customer_reviews.author: Jon F.

customer_reviews.title: I really loved this. The concept is great but unfortunately I ...
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this. The concept is great but unfortunately I had to return because it did not fit our bathtub faucet in the apartment we had been renting. Now that we moved into one that I'm sure it will fit, I will be ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria brown

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I use it every time I give my ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use it every time I give my toddler a bath. My bathtub faucets are very sensitive so it's hard to regulate the water temp & this is perfect for keeping me from letting the water get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: JP Favilla

customer_reviews.title: Makes sure the water is always the perfect temp for baby
customer_reviews.text: We couldn’t live without this product! Makes sure the water is always the perfect temp for baby.
customer_reviews.author: R.Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Make bath time a lot easier. (I used to use a meat thermometer lol)
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy this for a child's use. I'm using it to adjust the water temperature to a comfortable and repeatable setting when taking a shower or bath.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read display, seems accurate. Only issue for us is it falls off of our bathtub spout. We do not have that pull on top to help secure into place.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeShopper

product_meta.title: 4moms, Spout Cover, White
product_meta.description: Once your baby outgrows the 4Moms infant tub, the spout cover will help keep your child safe and comfortable at bath time. The integrated, color-coded digital thermometer makes it easy to set the perfect temperature for child's sensitive skin.
feature_bullets: Built-in thermometer with a color-coded display
Made with foam to prevent bumps and bruises caused by hitting the faucet
Offers easy access to the diverter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars372 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
